entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -30.3°C
